<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 73, 124, 87]]<|/det|>
## Data  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[78, 102, 675, 528]]<|/det|>
speed of light in free space, \(c = 3.00\times 10^{8}\mathrm{m s}^{- 1}\) permeability of free space, \(\mu_{0} = 4\pi \times 10^{- 7}\mathrm{Hm}^{- 1}\) permittivity of free space, \(\epsilon_{0} = 8.85\times 10^{- 12}\mathrm{Fm}^{- 1}\) elementary charge, \(e = 1.60\times 10^{- 19}\mathrm{C}\) the Planck constant, \(h = 6.63\times 10^{- 34}\mathrm{Js}\) unified atomic mass constant, \(u = 1.66\times 10^{- 27}\mathrm{kg}\) rest mass of electron, \(m_{\mathrm{e}} = 9.11\times 10^{- 31}\mathrm{kg}\) rest mass of proton, \(m_{\mathrm{p}} = 1.67\times 10^{- 27}\mathrm{kg}\) molar gas constant, \(R = 8.31\mathrm{JK}^{- 1}\mathrm{mol}^{- 1}\) the Avogadro constant, \(N_{\mathrm{A}} = 6.02\times 10^{23}\mathrm{mol}^{- 1}\) the Boltzmann constant, \(k = 1.38\times 10^{- 23}\mathrm{JK}^{- 1}\) gravitational constant, \(G = 6.67\times 10^{- 11}\mathrm{Nm}^{2}\mathrm{kg}^{- 2}\) acceleration of free fall, \(g = 9.81\mathrm{m s}^{- 2}\)

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 73, 167, 88]]<|/det|>

decay constant,  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 106, 555, 141]]<|/det|>
\[s = ut + \frac{1}{2} at^{2}\] \[\nu^{2} = u^{2} + 2as\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 160, 521, 175]]<|/det|>
\[W = p\Delta V\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 190, 531, 220]]<|/det|>
\[\phi = -\frac{Gm}{r}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 230, 515, 246]]<|/det|>
\[p = \rho gh\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 258, 570, 290]]<|/det|>
\[p = \frac{1}{3}\frac{Nm}{V} < c^2 >\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 297, 531, 313]]<|/det|>
\[a = -\omega^2 x\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 330, 600, 365]]<|/det|>
\[\nu = \nu_{0}\cos \omega t\] \[\nu = \pm \omega \sqrt{(x_{0}^{2} - x^{2})}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 377, 531, 410]]<|/det|>
\[V = \frac{Q}{4\pi\epsilon_{0}r}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[426, 430, 620, 448]]<|/det|>
\[1 / C = 1 / C_{1} + 1 / C_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 467, 590, 485]]<|/det|>
\[C = C_{1} + C_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 500, 522, 521]]<|/det|>
\[W = \frac{1}{2} QV\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 537, 590, 555]]<|/det|>
\[R = R_{1} + R_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[426, 572, 620, 590]]<|/det|>
\[1 / R = 1 / R_{1} + 1 / R_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 607, 555, 624]]<|/det|>
\[x = x_{0}\sin \omega t\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 642, 570, 660]]<|/det|>
\[x = x_{0}\exp (-\lambda t)\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[444, 675, 530, 708]]<|/det|>
\[\lambda = \frac{0.693}{t_{\frac{1}{2}}}\]

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[453, 73, 543, 89]]<|/det|>
## Section A  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[299, 103, 699, 121]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 150, 875, 184]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[433, 197, 564, 218]]<|/det|>
\[pV = \frac{1}{3} Nm< c^2>\]  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 230, 500, 248]]<|/det|>
where \(m\) is the mass of a molecule of the gas.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 416, 875, 450]]<|/det|>
A gas cylinder of volume \(2.1 \times 10^{4} \text{cm}^{3}\) contains helium- 4 gas at pressure \(6.1 \times 10^{5} \text{Pa}\) and temperature \(12^{\circ} \text{C}\). Helium- 4 may be assumed to be an ideal gas.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[156, 463, 185, 481]]<|/det|>
<label>(i)</label>  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[196, 463, 445, 481]]<|/det|>
Determine, for the helium gas,  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 494, 393, 511]]<|/det|>
1. the amount, in mol,  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[500, 677, 875, 695]]<|/det|>
<form>amount = ............................................... mol [3]  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 708, 410, 726]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[500, 893, 875, 911]]<|/det|>
<form>number = ............................................................ [2]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[151, 75, 180, 92]]<|/det|>
<label>(ii)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 75, 747, 92]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[892, 78, 940, 120]]<|/det|>
<form>For Examiner's Use</FORM>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[465, 256, 875, 274]]<|/det|>
<form>r.m.s. speed = ................................................. m s\(^{-1}\) [3]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 75, 96, 92]]<|/det|>
<label>2</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 75, 875, 108]]<|/det|>
A small frictionless trolley is attached to a fixed point A by means of a spring. A second spring is used to attach the trolley to a variable frequency oscillator, as shown in Fig. 2.1.

<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[195, 119, 812, 248]]<|/det|>
<center>Fig. 2.1 </center>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 298, 636, 314]]<|/det|>
Both springs remain extended within the limit of proportionality.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 313, 875, 345]]<|/det|>
Initially, the oscillator is switched off. The trolley is displaced horizontally along the line joining the two springs and is then released.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 345, 725, 361]]<|/det|>
The variation with time \(t\) of the velocity \(v\) of the trolley is shown in Fig. 2.2.

<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[165, 375, 860, 594]]<|/det|>
<center>Fig. 2.2 </center>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 645, 146, 664]]<|/det|>
<label>(a)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 645, 180, 664]]<|/det|>
<label>(i)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[195, 677, 546, 694]]<|/det|>
1. the displacement of the trolley is zero,

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[380, 707, 875, 725]]<|/det|>
\[\text{time} = \text{................................ s and time} = \text{................................ s} \quad [1]\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 739, 606, 756]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[380, 770, 875, 787]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[151, 73, 180, 90]]<|/det|>
<label>(ii)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 73, 617, 90]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[880, 81, 944, 115]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[484, 218, 875, 236]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[146, 250, 180, 268]]<|/det|>
<label>(iii)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 250, 873, 282]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[195, 297, 770, 313]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[428, 327, 875, 345]]<|/det|>
<form>phase difference = ......................................................... [1]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 359, 148, 377]]<|/det|>
<label>(b)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 359, 873, 390]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 390, 737, 406]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 406, 873, 437]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[482, 701, 875, 718]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 728, 146, 747]]<|/det|>
